abstract.p: The effects of fennel seed extract and its active compound trans‐Anethole were investigated in the STZ‐induced liver injury in rats. Both fennel and trans‐Anethole effectively reduced blood glucose levels, food and water intake, and intensity of weight loss during the treatment. Also, both fennel and trans‐Anethole improved the serum lipid profile, decreased serum aminotransferases, attenuated liver tissue oxidative damage, and reduced liver fibrosis in diabetic rats.
